00049  *
00050  *  File:  region.c

00061 /*===========================================================================*/
00062 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00063 #include <config.h>
00064 #include <library/heap.h>
00065 #include <library/stack.h>
00066 #include "global_cfg.h"
00067 #include "region.h"
00068 
00069 L_Alloc_Pool *Region_pool = NULL;
00070 L_Alloc_Pool *RegionMember_pool = NULL;
00071 L_Alloc_Pool *RegionAlloc_pool = NULL;
00072 HashTable regionNodeHashTbl;    /* Find a region from a node */
00073 
00074 void
00075 initRegion (void)
00076 {
00077   if (Region_pool == NULL)
00078     Region_pool = L_create_alloc_pool ("Region", sizeof (Region), 32);
00079   if (RegionMember_pool == NULL)
00080     RegionMember_pool = L_create_alloc_pool ("RegionMember",
00081                                              sizeof (RegionMember), 256);
00082   if (RegionAlloc_pool == NULL)
00083     RegionAlloc_pool =
00084       L_create_alloc_pool ("RegionAlloc", sizeof (RegionAlloc), 128);
00085 
00086   if (regionNodeHashTbl == NULL)
00087     regionNodeHashTbl = HashTable_create (512);
00088 }
00089 
00090 Region *
00091 newRegion (void)
00092 {
00093   Region *region = (Region *) L_alloc (Region_pool);
00094 
00095   region->id = -1;
00096   region->flags = 0;
00097   region->rclass = NULL;
00098   region->seed = NULL;
00099   region->memberList = NULL;
00100   region->enterList = NULL;
00101   region->exitList = NULL;
00102   region->members = NULL;
00103   region->nextRegion = NULL;
00104   region->weight = 0.0;
00105 
00106   region->allocList = NULL;
00107   region->regionAllocHashTbl = HashTable_create (128);
00108 
00109   return (region);
00110 }
00111 
00112 void
00113 freeRegion (Region * region)
00114 {
00115   RegionMember *mbr, *next;
00116 
00117   for (mbr = region->memberList; mbr != NULL; mbr = next)
00118     {
00119       next = mbr->nextMember;
00120 
00121       L_free (RegionMember_pool, mbr);
00122     }
00123   Set_dispose (region->members);
00124 
00125   L_free (Region_pool, region);
00126 }
00127 
00128 int
00129 inRegion (Region * region, Node * node)
00130 {
00131   return (Set_in (region->members, _NodeCb (node)));
00132 }
00133 
00134 void
00135 AddMember (Region * region, Node * node)
00136 {
00137   RegionMember *new_rm = (RegionMember *) L_alloc (RegionMember_pool);
00138 
00139   /* Add cb to region member linked list */
00140   _RegionMemberNode (new_rm) = node;
00141   if (region->memberList != NULL)
00142     new_rm->nextMember = region->memberList;
00143   else
00144     new_rm->nextMember = NULL;
00145 
00146   region->memberList = new_rm;
00147 
00148   /* Update search tables */
00149   HashTable_insert (regionNodeHashTbl, _NodeId (node), region);
00150 
00151   /* Add cb to region member set */
00152   region->members = Set_add (region->members, _NodeCb (node));
00153 }
00154 
00155 void
00156 addRegionMemberCb (Region * region, L_Cb * cb)
00157 {
00158   RegionMember *new_rm = (RegionMember *) L_alloc (RegionMember_pool);
00159 
00160   /* Add cb to region member linked list */
00161   new_rm->member.cb = cb;
00162   if (region->memberList != NULL)
00163     new_rm->nextMember = region->memberList;
00164   else
00165     new_rm->nextMember = NULL;
00166 
00167   region->memberList = new_rm;
00168 
00169   /* Update search tables */
00170   HashTable_insert (regionNodeHashTbl, cb->id, region);
00171 
00172   /* Add cb to region member set */
00173   region->members = Set_add (region->members, cb->id);
00174 }
00175 
00176 void
00177 printRegionCbs (Region * region)
00178 {
00179   RegionMember *member;
00180 
00181   fprintf (stdout, "********\n*Region %d:\n*\n", region->id);
00182   fprintf (stdout, "*\tWeight: %f\n", region->weight);
00183   fprintf (stdout, "*\tBlocks:\n");
00184 
00185   for (member = region->memberList; member != NULL;
00186        member = member->nextMember)
00187     {
00188       fprintf (stdout, "*\t\t%d\n", _RegionMemberCb (member)->id);
00189     }
00190   fprintf (stdout, "*\n********\n");
00191 }
